examples.korean: The policy is designed to boost productivity. 발음듣기 이 방침은 생산력 증진을 위해 마련되었습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: The policy is designed to boost productivity. 발음

examples.korean: Can you provide more details about your ideas to improve productivity? 발음듣기 생산력을 높이는 방안에 대해 좀 더 자세히 말씀해주시겠습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Can you provide more details about your ideas to improve productivity? 발음

examples.korean: Smaller size of work force equals to decreased productivity and furthermore economic halt. 발음듣기 노동가능인구수의 축소는 생산력의 감소, 더 나아가 경제침체와 같은 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: Smaller size of work force equals to decreased productivity and furthermore economic halt. 발음

examples.korean: How long will it take to increase our production capacity? 발음듣기 우리의 생산력을 증가시키려면 기간이 얼마나 걸릴까요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: How long will it take to increase our production capacity? 발음

examples.korean: The division of labor brought about a substantial improvement in productivity. 발음듣기 분업은 막대한 생산력 향상을 가져왔다 Neungyule
examples.english: The division of labor brought about a substantial improvement in productivity. 발음
